direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve querying historical data related to margin account transactions.
Both methods query historical records related to margin account activities, though focused on different aspects (repayment vs. capital flow).
Both methods involve querying historical data related to margin account activities, specifically interest history and capital flow.
Both methods query historical records related to margin account activities, though focused on different aspects (liquidation vs. capital flow).
